input_email_body:
Subject: Issue with Magento Integration

There was a system error when integrating Magento 2.4 via Zapier, which might be due to API mismatches. After reinstalling plugins and checking configurations, the issue still exists My name is Maria Gonzalez.. I need help to resolve this and ensure a smooth integration process. You can reach me at johndoe@email.com.
